data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Komai, Tomoyuki, Yang, Chien-Hui, Okuno, Junji, Chan, Tin-Yam (2011): Revisiting Pagurus pilosipes (Stimpson, 1858) (Crustacea: Decapoda: Anomura: Paguridae). Zootaxa 3096: 41-52, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.202569
